# File: MBDL.all.processed.pdb_postPG_clusters.txt
# Contains the rigid clusters of atoms, listed with atom numbers from PDB file. 
# Each rigid cluster is shown as a list of atom numbers, one number per line.
# Clusters are separated by empty lines.
